title: Normalize Audio
description: Optimize audio levels for consistent loudness
pageDescription: Optimize audio levels for consistent loudness
aboutDescription: Audio normalization adjusts the overall level of audio to achieve consistent loudness standards, making your audio sound professional and broadcast-ready.

sections.title: What Normalization Does
content: Adjusts peak levels to optimal ranges

sections.title: When to Normalize
content: To match levels in audio compilations

sections.title: Loudness Standards
content: Broadcast: -23 LUFS for TV, -16 LUFS for radio
